created_time: November 10, 2022, 12:53:34 PMLast edit: February 23, 2024, 12:33:51 PM by AB de Royse777
content: MEGAPARI offers many additional markets on specific events: European handicap, correct score, run of play, over/under, team to score first etc. They also have a great selection of markets on international games on a club and country level.ABOUT THE CAMPAIGNMEGAPARI launched their signature campaign again. You are encouraged to make a discussion on their official ANN. As the campaign manager, I hold marketing budget and every week I update existing balance. When you are joining the campaign, please read the latest post to know escrow balance. If there are not enough balance for coming weeks then join at your own risk however it's always expected that when funds are not sufficient the management will top up the escrow balance.CAMPAIGN REWARDSSr.+: $2.50 BTC per postCAMPAIGN RULES▶️ Wear appropriate Signature, avatar.▶️ Gambling board regulars will be given priority.▶️ No minimum per week, no local board limitation, maximum 15 posts will be considered per week to be paid.▶️ Post must be minimum 150 characters long and constructive.▶️ Posts in the following boards/sections are not eligible: "Off-Topic", "Archival, Games & Rounds", "Investor-Based Games", "Wall Observers", "Serious Discussion", "Altcoin Discussion", "Lending", "Press", "Politics & Society", other signature campaign threads including this one, any Altcoin and Bounty ANN threads and areas where the signature is not visible.▶️ No valid negative from DT network unless per-approves by me. ▶️ Multi-account (alts) can apply but will need to give up all except only one if accepted more than one.▶️ Join my telegram group: https://t.me/R7BountyQACAMPAIGN RULES▶️ You are not allowed to change anything on the signature code, if found then you will be disqualified without prior notice.▶️ I reserve the full right to add/remove any participants, push/cancel/reopen the campaign or any rules of this campaign.▶️ Week starts from Thursday and ends on Wednesday UTC.▶️ Please check the spreadsheet comment column regularly, and also always check your payment information when asked.HOW TO APPLYReply to this thread with the following informationCode: Forum Rank: Bech32 address:..SPREADSHEET..AVATAR AND SIGNATURE SETLink : https://i.ibb.co/x1NWw81/mega-avatar.pngSIGNATURE
